snippet: Cassandra Huysentruyt Grey pursues business, philanthropic and social issues, separate from her husband Brad Grey, the chairman and chief executive of Paramount Pictures.
abstract: Profile of Cassandra Huysentruyt Grey, second wife of Paramount Pictures chairman and chief executive Brad Grey; she discusses some big ambitions for a fashion studio and vintage clothing line that she runs in West Hollywood.
lead_paragraph: Cassandra Huysentruyt Grey pursues business, philanthropic and social issues, separate from her husband Brad Grey, the chairman and chief executive of Paramount Pictures.

headline.seo: Don’t Call Cassandra Huysentruyt Grey a Trophy Wife
headline.main: Don’t Call Her a Trophy Wife
headline.print_headline: Don’t Call Her a Trophy Wife
